options.name: authenticationRequired
options.desc: Whether users must authenticate when using the web UI or command-linetool

options.name: bind
options.desc: Address to bind to. The default is to bind to all addresses

options.name: corsOrigins
options.desc: List of URLs that can access the API for Cross-Origin ResourceSharing (CORS)

options.name: databaseName
options.desc: Name of the database instance to connect to

options.name: databaseUrl
options.desc: URL of the MongoDB or PostgreSQL database to connect to

options.name: extraConfig
options.desc: These lines go into alertad.conf verbatim.

options.name: logDir
options.desc: Location where the logfiles are stored

options.name: port
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: signupEnabled
options.desc: Whether to prevent sign-up of new users via the web UI
